SELECT * FROM notices WHERE status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY is_top DESC, created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notices ( category, title, content, image_url, is_top, status, view_count, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imageUrl}, IFNULL(#{isTop}, 'N'), #{status}, 0, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM app_versions ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO app_versions (os_type, version_name, version_code, force_update_yn, message, created_at) VALUES (#{osType}, #{versionName}, #{versionCode}, #{forceUpdateYn}, #{message}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM terms ORDER BY type ASC, version DESC
SELECT * FROM terms WHERE type = #{type} ORDER BY created_at DESC, version DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO terms (type, title, content, version, is_required, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{type}, #{title}, #{content}, #{version}, #{isRequired}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE terms SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, version = #{version}, is_required = #{isRequired}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE term_id = #{termId}
mapper.select: SELECT version_id, os_type, version_name, version_code, force_update_yn AS forceUpdateYn, message, created_at FROM app_versions WHERE os_type = #{osType} ORDER BY version_code DESC LIMIT 1
